thread.title: Ocean Canyon Properties and Mountain Lakes RV Resort Hosting 14th Annual Mountain Lakes Music Festival
thread.title_full: Ocean Canyon Properties and Mountain Lakes RV Resort Hosting 14th Annual Mountain Lakes Music Festival - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Ocean Canyon Properties and Mountain Lakes RV Resort Hosting 14th Annual Mountain Lakes Music Festival
text:
Taking place along the shores of Lake Guntersville, the festival brings together musicians and bluegrass lovers of all kinds.
Langston, Alabama (PRWEB) October 20, 2015
Ocean Canyon Properties, a privately owned membership resort and RV camping company, is pleased to announce their 14th Annual Mountain Lakes Music Festival, November 2nd through 7th, 2015.
The Mountain Lakes Music Festival is a great celebration of Southern musical tradition and will be held at Mountain Lakes Resort in Langston, Alabama. The festival is one of the most popular events put on every year by Ocean Canyon Properties. The week long festivities start at 2pm, Sunday, November 1st with a jam session with members and musicians alike. That evening, music will be put on by the Ft. Payne Worship Center Quartet in the Chapel to close out Sunday’s worship. The festival will run until the following Saturday, November 7th. Other bands that will be attending and performing this year include, Wills Family Bluegrass, Pine Mountain Bluegrass, The Goggans Family, Dewey Wells and Friends, Backwoods Revival, and more. With daily jam sessions with campers and featured musicians alike, the Mountain Lakes Music festival is certain to be a special week. Member participation and daily jam sessions are just some of the many things that make the Mountain Lakes Music Festival so special.
“It’s hard to believe this is the 14th annual Bluegrass Festival. Pickin’ and grinnin’ is a way of life here at Mountain Lakes, and we look forward to this event every year. Here’s to 14 more years!” said Mickey Murdock, resort manager of Mountain Lakes.
The Mountain Lakes Music Festival is one of the many annual festivals and celebrations produced by Ocean Canyon Properties. Other celebrations include the American Cancer Society’s Relay for Life Chili Cook-off at Tres Rios RV Resort in Glen Rose, Texas, Abita Springs Crawfish Boil at Abita Springs RV Resort in Abita Springs, LA, the Styx River Seafood Festival at Styx River RV Resort in Robertsdale, AL, and our Witchy Weekends Halloween Fest at our newest location, Compton Ridge Campground and Lodge, in Branson, MO.
Mountain Lakes Resort is situated on the eastern shore of Lake Guntersville just 40 miles southeast of Huntsville, AL. It's a beautiful and relaxing place for musicians to collaborate and create inspiring music in the southern tradition. Music performances take place at the “Eagle’s Nest”, the top floor of the members’ club house. The venue overlooks the western mountains on the shore of Lake Guntersville and will be taking place during peak foliage in the area, guaranteeing you and your family a beautiful vacation setting.
In addition to year-round planned activities, the resort features many recreational amenities for members to enjoy, including several fishing piers and boat docks, an indoor and outdoor pool, and volleyball courts.
For information about the festival and membership opportunities at Mountain Lakes Resort, please call 1-877-327-2484 or visit http://www.oceancanyon.com .
About Ocean Canyon Properties
Ocean Canyon Properties is a growing system of seven privately owned, membership resorts that offer spacious RV campsites, comfortable vacation cabins, cottages and condos along with a wide variety of private resort amenities. With beautiful resort locations situated throughout the southern United States, OCP resorts provide a safe, secure and enjoyable recreational experience that so many families seek.
The Ocean Canyon Properties senior management team has been directly involved in the membership camping resort industry on a national platform for over 30 years. This experience, combined with the rigorous standards of operation at both the resort and corporate levels ensure that the company operates securely, responsibly and continually provides the highest levels of service to its members, their guests and employees. Ocean Canyon is active in supporting community organizations that help children and families in the Southeast. You can find out more at http://www.oceancanyon.com .
